items.name: Miracle Ornament
explicitMods: 3% chance to receive additional Blight items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
4% chance to receive additional Weapons when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
1% chance in Heists for Chaos Orbs to drop as Divine Orbs instead
7% chance in Heists for Orbs of Transmutation to drop as Orbs of Alchemy instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
